features: 【High-Quality Bamboo Materials】 We choose bamboo grown in a natural alpine region. The texture is hard, the structure is firm, and the service life is long. After high temperature carbonization, the product is waterproof and not easy to crack and deform.1

【Strong and Sturdy Quality】 strong load-bearing, stable and durable, each layer of the Shoe Rack can bear the weight of 40LB. After the thickening of the laminate and the bracket, the full solid bamboo board makes the product more solid and stable.

【Wide Range of Uses】This Shoe Rack keeps your shoes organized. In addition, its unique design style makes it suitable for most scenes. It can be used as a bookshelf or flower rack in the living room or bedroom, and it can also be used to put towels and toiletries in the bathroom. You can also place dishes and sundries in the kitchen cabinet if you want.

【Stackable Design】 The perfect tenon joint design allows no tools to be stacked. The shoe rack is connected by embedding a groove between the upper and lower frames. You can buy two racks to stack a 4-tier shoe rack, or to create more units to house all your things.

【Satisfactory After-sales】Dranixly offers premium products for your home while exceeding the highest industry standards and offering impeccable customer care. Any problem during normal usage, or any dissatisfaction with the shoe rack, Contact us, replacement or Refund both accepted. Our goal is to make you completely satisfied with this purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Use in the entryway Keep your shoes and bags organized with ease. Use in the living room Transform into a bookshelf to store all books. Use in the bathroom Put towels and toiletries, etc.

Use in the cabinet Store personal items such as indoor clothes and shoes, etc. Use in the bedroom Transform into a flower rack to decorate your life. Use in the kitchen Place dishes and sundries, and more.

Our Efforts For Better Quality The panel is widened. The product is more sturdy and more suitable for placing things. The mortise on the top is used to connect another shoe rack. We adopt the threaded structure so that once the rack is connected with another one, it will be integrated, and the upper shelf will not shake. We change the hinge in the middle to be movable. If the panel is not well aligned at the beginning, you can slightly move it to make it flat. We changed the hole of the joint between the feet and the panel to be large outside and small inside. The advantage of this is that the screws will not be crooked, making the four feet consistent with the ground.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: These aren’t the highest quality, but they are cost effective, simple, and perfect for what I needed. I have them under a bench in our mud room, so no one really sees them that much. I can now fit three layers of shoes under there vs. one. They came a little dusty, but I was able to wipe them off and they were fine. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewerName: HM in Peoria AZHM in Peoria AZ
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple cute shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: Shoe rack is very simple to put together and looks nice. Not super durable but fits my needs perfectly. Perfect for small space and a few pairs of shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crappy material but looks good and does it’s job
reviews.reviewText: It’s crappy material as expected from the price, but the color is great, the size is as expected, and it’s durable to support like 9 pairs of shoes on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble but...
reviews.reviewText: The shoe rack was easy to assemble. However, it was very dirty and some of the paint has been scratched off somehow. I cleaned it and I'm debating whether to return it or see if I can paint it myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material but looks pretty!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy to put together. Material is definitely not superior so do not expect bamboo because it is not. It is cheap thin wood stained. It does the job, holds 6 pairs easy and you can also use the under it from the bottom without shelf and add 3 more pairs. It is not worth the $12 I paid but good enough for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Looks nice in person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shoe rack!
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack is a great way to store shoes in a small area. It is able to add several shelves to it and is incredibly durable. It is easy to put together with the instructions and tools provided. It really brings together my living room in a cute way and makes my shoes look more organized. It is also a life-saver with snow. I have it by my front door, ready to put all my wet shoes away. However, do be aware that if you only buy the two-shelf rack, there are little spikes at the top where other shelves can attack making it look a little interesting. You wouldn't notice it unless you looked closely but that is something to be aware of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Daughter wanted attractive shoe rack for entryway. Ordered this for her in natural. It's simple to assemble, although allen wrench that came with it did not work well, and we had to use our own more substantial one. The rack doesn't not sit flush on the floor (rocks slightly) so had to use a felt adhesive to even it out. May settle with weigh on it. THe slatted racks are hinged for shipping but look okay once laid flat. However the rack is a bit shallow and short for adult shoes, unless you move it out from wall and are only putting flats or sandals on the middle and lower shelf. The bamboo wood feesl flimsy. Had I been selecting for her I would have gone with a metal rack with higher clearance and deeper shelves.
